name: Switchland Rescue
description:
Break the rules and put yourself in the shoes of the typical "damsel in distress", because this time, THE GIRL will be in charge of rescuing her loved one over and over again.

Razzel is a powerful witch with a malevolent plan about to set in motion to bring the kingdom of Switchland under her yoke.

But, precisely on the chosen day, his lackeys find in one of his mines the "Mirror of Destiny", an artifact lost for centuries capable of revealing the destiny of the one who invokes it.
So Razzel uses the powers of the mirror and discovers that the love of some lovers will end his power plans, so he decides to postpone his plans and kidnap one of them so that the fire of his love goes out and the prediction of the mirror does not is fulfilled.

However, he does not count on the girl having the courage to face any kind of danger and will do anything to get her lover back, even ... have your help!

Travel the kingdom of Switchland freeing your beloved from his confinement. But do not think that it will be an easy task, since on the way you will meet a thousand and one dangers that will require your cunning and skill.

MAIN FEATURES:

  • Great and colorful graphics.
  • 2 different simple mechanics.
  • You only need 1 (or 2) fingers to play.
  • Discover a lot of mechanisms with which to interact.
  • 24 levels that will test your cunning.
  • Awesome soundtrack by fiftysounds.com.
  • Puzzle, action and strategy in equal parts.
  • Fun from start to finish... and in very little space!
  • So challenging that you will want to play it again.
  • Texts in 2 languages: English and Spanish.

.
